mita amatharawa, suli sulan thaththwayath samanga niwasawalata ha pradhana margawalata kada watunu gas iwath kirimata batahira aarakshaka sena mulasthanaya yatathe sthapitha 61 wana senankayata ayath mathara pradeshaye pihiti 613 wana balasena balapradeshaye sthanagatha 20 wana shri lanka sinha rejimenthuwe bhatapiris ikuth irida (17) dina sahaya wuha. 613 wana balasenawe balasenadhipathithumange adhikshanaya yatathe galla disthrikkaye alpitiya pradeshaye haniyata path niwasa 34 k prathisanskaranaya kirimata da bhatapiris wisin sahayogaya labadunha. 20 wana shri lanka sinha rejimenthuwe anadena niladharige sambandhikaranayen diyath karanu labu mema sahana meheyum batahira aarakshaka sena aagnyapathithuman saha 61 wana senankaye senankadhipathithuman samipa nirikshanayata lakwiya.

surya niwruththiya yana padaya bindi aththe, surya (hiru) saha niwruththaya (nishchala) yana sinhala wadan deken wana athara, ese wanne, surya niwruththiyak siduwimehidi, awanithiyak nomathiwa suryaya nishchalawa sitina bawini ; enam, suryayage gaman pathayehi (pruthiwiyehi sita nirikshanaya karana wita penena ayurin) sruthumaya chalanaya, ehi dishawa anek pasata siduwimata pera madak nawathi sitina bawaki.

yapanaya saha kilinochchi disthrikka sandaha sandhanaya idiripath kala nama yojana pathraye ‘ sandhanaya ‘ wenuwata yoda athi demala pariwarthanaya wenas wima mathada, yatinuwara pradeshiya sabhawa wenuwen idiripath kala nama yojana pathraye ‘ eksath janatha ‘ pamanak sandahan kara sandhanaya yanna sandan kara nothibima matha mema namayojana pathra prathikshepa wi thibunu athara eewa prathikshepa wimata hethuwa washayen therim bhara niladharin wisin sandhanaye maha lekam susil premajayantha mahathata ewa athi lipiye sandahan kara aththe piligath deshapalana pakshayak wisin namayojana pathraya idiripath kara nothibima yanuwen bawada premajayantha mahatha wenuwen peni siti janadhipathi nithignya shayis musthapa mahatha adhikaranayata pawasiya.sandhanaye maha lekam susil prema jayantha mahatha namayojana pathraye assan kara athi athara eya eksath janatha nidahas sandhana wisin idiripath kerunu bawa thahawuru wana bawath musthapa mahatha kiya.
